GK19bahcar1u:262: āsīnayāśca tayorāsīna nāticiramiva sthitvā taṃ dvitīyaṃ

GK19bahcar1u:266: apragalbhamapi janaṃ prabhavatā praśrayeṇārpitaṃ mano madhviva vācālayati
GK19bahcar1u:267: ayatnenaivātinamre sādhau dhanuṣīva guṇaḥ parāṃ koṭimāropayati visrambhaḥ
GK19bahcar1u:268: janayanti ca vismayamatidhīradhiyāmapyadṛṣṭapūrvā dṛśyamānā jagati sraṣṭuḥ sṛṣṭyatiśayāḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:270: saujanyaparatantrā ceyaṃ devānāṃpriyasyātibhadratā kārayati kathāṃ na tu yuvatijanasahotthā taralatā /
GK19bahcar1u:272: deśaḥ? kva vā gantavyam? ko vāyamapahṛtaharahuṅkārāhaṅkāro 'para
GK19bahcar1u:273: ivānanyajo yuvā? kiṃnāmno vā samṛddhatapasaḥ piturayamamṛtavarṣī kaustubhamaṇiriva haterhṛdayamāhlādayati? kā cāsya tribhuvananamasyā
GK19bahcar1u:274: vibhātasaṃdhyeva mahatastejeso jananī? kāni vāsya puṇya bhāñji
GK19bahcar1u:275: bhajantyabhikyāmakṣarāṇi? āryaparijñāne 'pyayameva kramaḥ kautukānurodhino hṛdayasya' ityuktavatyāṃ tasyāṃ prakaṭitaśrayo 'sau
GK19bahcar1u:277: na kevalamānanaṃ hṛdayamapi ca te candramayamiva sudhāśīkaraśītalairāhlādayati vacobhiḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:278: saujanyajanmabhūmayo bhūyasā śūbhana sajjananirmāṇaśilpakalā iva bhāvadṛśyo dṛśyante /

GK19bahcar1u:285: janyanyasya jitajagato 'nekapārthivasahasrānuyātasya śaryātasya sutā rājaputrī tribhuvanakanyāratnaṃ sukanyā nāma /
GK19bahcar1u:286: tāṃ khalu devīmantarvatnīṃ viditvā vaijanane māsi prasavāya pitā patyuḥ pārśvātsvagṛhamānāyayata
GK19bahcar1u:287: asūta ca sā tatra devī dīrghāyuṣamenam /

GK19bahcar1u:290: aśikṣatāyaṃ tatraiva, sarpā vidyāḥ sakalāśca kalāḥ /

GK19bahcar1u:292: māmapi tasyaiva devasya sugṛhītanāmnaḥ śaryātasyājñākāriṇaṃ vikukṣināmānaṃ bhṛtyaparamāṇumavadhārayatu bhavatī /
GK19bahcar1u:295: uttamānāṃ ca cirantanatā janayatyanujīvinyapi jane kiyanmātramapi mandākṣam /
GK19bahcar1u:297: etaśca gavyūtimātramiva pāreśoṇaṃ tasya bhagavataścyavanasya svanāmnā nirmitavyapadeśaṃ cyāvanaṃ nāma caitrarathakalpaṃ kānanaṃ nivāsaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:299: yadi ca vo gṛhītakṣaṇaṃ dākṣiṇyamanavahelaṃ vā hadayamasmākamupari bhūmirvā prasādānāmayaṃ janaḥ śravaṇārhe vā, tato na vimānanīyo 'yaṃ naḥ prathamaḥ praṇayaḥ kutūhalasya /
GK19bahcar1u:303: tatkathaya katamo vaṃśaḥ spṛhaṇīyatāṃ janmanā gītaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:304: kā ceyamatrabhavatī bhavatyāḥ samīpe samavāya iva virodhināṃ padārthānām /
GK19bahcar1u:305_0: tathā hi, sannihitabālāndhakārā bhāsvanmūrtiśca, puṇḍarīkamukhī hariṇalocanā ca, bālātapaprabhādhārā kumudahāsinī ca, kalahaṃsasvanā
GK19bahcar1u:306: karabhorurvilambitagamanā ca, amuktakumārabhāvā snigdhatārakā ca' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:311: āryeṇa na vismaraṇīyo 'yamanuṣaṅgadṛṣṭo janaḥ' itya bhidhāya tūṣṇīmabhūt /
GK19bahcar1u:318: turagārūḍhaṃ ca taṃ prayāntaṃ sarasvatī suciramuttambhitapakṣmaṇā niścalatārakeṇa likhiteneva cakṣuṣā vyalokayat /
GK19bahcar1u:319: uttīrya ca śoṇama cireṇaiva kālena dadhīcaḥ piturāśramapadaṃ jagāma /
GK19bahcar1u:320: gata ca tasminsā tāmeva diśamālokayantī suciramatiṣṭhat /
GK19bahcar1u:322: atha muhūrtamātramiva sthitvā smṛtvā ca tāṃ tasya rūpasapadaṃ punaḥpunarvyasma yatāsyā hṛdayam
GK19bahcar1u:325: aprihatamapi manastenaiva sādhaṃmagāt ajāyata ca navapallava iva bālavanalatāyāḥ kuto 'pyasyā anurāgaścetasi /
GK19bahcar1u:326: tataḥ prabhṛti ca sālasyeva śūnyeva sanidreva dikasamanayat /
GK19bahcar1u:327: aratamupayāti ca pratyakparyastamaṇḍale lāṅgalikāstabakatāmratviṣi kamalinīkāmuke kaṭhorasālasaśiraḥśoṇaśociṣi sāvitre trayīmaye tejasi,
GK19bahcar1u:328: taruṇataratamālaśyāmale ca malinayati vyoma vyomavyāpini timirasaṃcaye,
GK19bahcar1u:329_0: saṃcaratsiddhasundarīnūpuraravānusāriṇi ca mandaṃ mandaṃ mandākinīhaṃsa iva samutsarpati śaśini gaganatalam kṛtasaṃdhyāpraṇāmā
GK19bahcar1u:329_1: niśāmukha eva nipatya vimuktāṅgī pallavaśayane tasthau /
GK19bahcar1u:330: sāvitryapi kṛtvā yathākriyamāṇaṃ sāyantanaṃ kriyākalāpamucite śayanakāle kisalayaśayanamabhajata jātanidrā ca suṣvāpa /
GK19bahcar1u:332: acintayacca--”martyalokaḥ khalu sarvalokānāmupari, yasminnevaṃvidhāni bhavati tribhuvanabhūṣaṇāni sakalaguṇagrāmagurūṇi ratnāni /
GK19bahcar1u:337: puṇyabhāñji tāni cakṣūṃṣi cetāṃsi yauvanāni vā straiṇāni, yeṣāmasāvaviṣayo darśanasya /
GK19bahcar1u:338: kṣaṇaṃ nu darśayatā ca tamanyajanmaniteneva me phalitamadharmeṇa /
GK19bahcar1u:350: atha gaṇarātrāpagame nivartamānastenaiva vartmanā taṃ deśaṃ samāgatya tathaiva nivāritaparijanaśchatradhāradvitīyo vikukṣirḍuḍhauke /
GK19bahcar1u:351: sarasvatī tu taṃ dūrādeva saṃmukhamāgacchantaṃ prītyā sasaṃbhramamutthāya vanamṛgīvodgrīvā vilokayantī mārgapariśrāntamasnapayadiva dhavalitadaśadiśā dṛśā /
GK19bahcar1u:352: kṛtāsanaparigrahaṃ tu taṃ prītyā sāvitrī papraccha--”ārya, kaccit kuśalī kumāraḥ?' iti
GK19bahcar1u:358: anvakṣamāgamiṣyatyeva mālatīti nāmnā bāṇinī vārtāṃ vo vijñātum /
GK19bahcar1u:363: tasya hi gacchato yadṛcchayā kathamapyaṃsukamiva mārgalatāsu mānasamasmāsu muhūrtamāsaktamāsīt
GK19bahcar1u:365: alasaḥ khalu loko yadevaṃ sulabhasauhārdāni yena kenacinna krīṇāti mahatāṃ manāṃsi /
GK19bahcar1u:366: so 'yamaudāryātiśayaḥ so 'pi mahātmanāmitarajanadurlabho yenopakaraṇīkurvanti tribhuvanam' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:368: aparedyurudyati bhagavati dyumaṇāvuddāmadyutāvabhidrutatārake tiraskṛtatamasi tāmarasavyāsavyasanini sahasraraśmau śoṇamutīryāyāntī,
GK19bahcar1u:370: sphuṭitātimuktakakusumastabakasamatviṣi saṭāle mahati mṛgapatāviva gaurī turaṅgame sthita, salīlamurobandhāropitasya tiryagutkarṇaturagākarṇya,
GK19bahcar1u:371_0: mānanūpurapaṭuraṇitasyātibahalena piṇḍālaktakena pallavitasya kuṅkumapiñjaritapṛṣṭhasya caraṇayugalasya prasaradbhiratilohitaiḥ
GK19bahcar1u:371_2: raśanayā śiñjānajaghanasthalā, dhautadhavalanetranirmitena nirmokalaghutareṇāprapadīnena kañcukena tirohitatanulatā,
GK19bahcar1u:373: ratnanidhānamādadhānā, hāreṇāmalakīphalanistulamuktāphalena sphuritasthūlagrahagaṇaśārā śāradīva śvetaviralajaladharapaṭalāvṛtā dyauḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:374: kucapūrṇakalaśayorupari ratnaprālambamālikāmaruṇaharitakiraṇakisalayinīṃ kasyāpi puṇyavato hṛdayapraveśavanamālikāmiva baddhāṃ dhārayantī,
GK19bahcar1u:375: prakoṣṭhaniviṣṭasyaikasya hāṭakakaṭakasya marakatamakaravedikāsanāthasya haritīkṛtadigantābhirmaṃyūkhasaṃtatibhiḥ sthalakamalinībiriva lakṣmīśaṅkhayānugamyamānā,
GK19bahcar1u:379_1: mṛgamadāmodaniṣyadinā tilakabindunā mudritamiva manobhavasarvasvaṃ vadanamudvahantī, lalāṭalāsakasya sīmantacumbinaścaṭulātilakamaṇerudañcatā
GK19bahcar1u:384: suratataroḥ, bālavidyeva vaidagdhyasya, kaumudīva kānteḥ, dhṛtiriva
GK19bahcar1u:387_1: bakulasurabhiniḥśvasitayā campakāvadātadehayā kusumamayyeva tāmbūlakaraṇḍavāhinyā mālatī samadṛśyata /
GK19bahcar1u:388: dūrādeva ca dadhīcapremṇā sarasvatyā luṇṭhiteva manorathaiḥ, ākṛṣṭeva
GK19bahcar1u:398_0: krameṇa cātīte madhyandinasamaye śoṇamavatīrṇāyāṃ sāvitryāṃ snātumutsāritaparijanā sākūteva mālatī kusumasrastaśāyinīṃ samupasṛtya
GK19bahcar1u:400_2: jīvitāśāmiva samāsannataruṇatarulatāmavalambamānā, samutphullasya mukhaśaśino lāvaṇyapravāheṇa śṛṅgārarasenevāplāvayantī
GK19bahcar1u:402: “upāṃśu kathaya' iti kapolatalanatibimbitāṃ lajjayā karṇamūlamiva mālatīṃ praveśayantī madhurayā girā sudhīramuvāca--”sakhi mālati,
GK19bahcar1u:405: sā na kācidyā na bhavasi me svasā sakhī praṇayinī prāṇasamā ca /
GK19bahcar1u:406: niyujyatāṃ yāvataḥ kāryasya kṣamaṃ kṣodīyasī garīyasī vā śarīrakamidam /
GK19bahcar1u:410: sā tvavādīt--”devi, jānāsyeva mādhuryaṃ viṣayāṇām, lolupatāṃ
GK19bahcar1u:411: cendriyagrāmasya, unmāditāṃ ca navayauvanasya, pāriplavatāṃ ca manasaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:414: na ca bāliśatā capalatā cāraṇatā vā vācālatāyāḥ kāraṇam /
GK19bahcar1u:416: sā tvaṃ devi, yadaiva dṛṣṭāsi devena tata evārabyāsya kāmo guruḥ, candramā
GK19bahcar1u:418: paramasuhṛt, prajāgara āptaḥ, manorathāḥ sarvagatāḥ, niḥśvāsā
GK19bahcar1u:419: vigrahāgresarāḥ, mṛtyuḥ pārśvavartī, raṇaraṇakaḥ saṃcārakaḥ saṃkalpā
GK19bahcar1u:422: anurūpo deva ityātmasaṃbhāvanā, śīlavāniti prakramaviruddham, dhora
GK19bahcar1u:424: nipuṇopakṣepaḥ, jānāti sevitumityasvāmibāvocitam, icchati dāsabhāvamāmaraṇātkartumiti dhūrtālāpaḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:427: svapne 'pyasya bahuśaḥ kṛtaprasādāsītyasākṣikam, prāṇarakṣārthamarthayata iti kātaratā, tatra gamyatāmityājñā, vārito 'pi balādāgacchatīti paribhavaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:428: tadevamagocare girāmasīti śrutvā devī pramāṇam' ityabhidhāya tūṣṇīmabhūta /
GK19bahcar1u:429: atha sarasvatī prītivisphāritena cakṣuṣā pratyavādīta-”ayi, na śaknomi bahu bāṣitum /
GK19bahcar1u:432: mālatī tu devi, yadājñāpayasi, atiprasādāya' iti vyāhṛtya praharṣaparavaśā
GK19bahcar1u:436: utkaṇṭhābhārabhṛtā ca tāmyatā cetasā kalpāyitaṃ kathaṅkathamapi divasaśeṣamanaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar1u:437: astamupagate ca bhagavati gabhastimati, stimitataramavatarati tamasi,
GK19bahcar1u:438_0: prahasitāmiva sitāṃ diśaṃ paurandarīṃ darīmiva kesariṇi muñcati candramasi sarasvatī śucini cīnāṃśukasukumāratare taraṅgiṇi
GK19bahcar1u:438_1: dugūlakomalaśayana iva śoṇasaikate samupaviṣṭā svapnakṛtaprārthanā pādapatanalagnāṃ dadhīcacaraṇanakhacandrikāmiva lalāṭikāṃ
GK19bahcar1u:439: gaṇḍasthalādarśapratibimbatena “cāruhāsini, ayamasāvāhṛto hṛdayadayito janaḥ' iti śravaṇasamīpavartinā
GK19bahcar1u:440_0: vikīryamāṇanakhakiraṇacakravālena vālavyajanīkṛtacandrakalākalāpeneva kareṇa vījayantī svedinaṃ kapolapaṭṭam, “atra dadhīcādṛte
GK19bahcar1u:440_1: na kenacitpraveṣṭavyam' iti tiraśvīnaṃ cittabhuvā pātitāṃ vilāsavetralatāmiva bālamṛṇālikāmadhistanaṃ stanayantī kathamapi
GK19bahcar1u:440_2: hṛdayena vahanti pratipālayāmāsa āsīccāsyā manasi--”ahamapi nāma sarasvatī yatrāmunā
GK19bahcar1u:442: tatra kā gaṇanetarāsu tapasvinīṣvatitaralāsu taruṇīṣu' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:443: ājagāma ca madhumāsa iva surabhigandhavāhaḥ, haṃsa iva kṛtamṛṇāladhṛtiḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:445: ivāhitasarasacandanaghavalatanulatotkampaḥ, kṛṣyamāṇa iva kṛtakarakacagraheṇa grahapatinā, preryamāṇa iva kandarpoddīpanadakṣeṇa
GK19bahcar1u:448: antaḥsphuratā mattamadanakarikarṇaśahkhāyamānena pratimendunā prathamasamāgamavilāsavilakṣasmiteneva dhavalīkriyamāṇaikakapolodaro mālatīdvitīyo dadhīcaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:449: āgatya ca hṛdayagatadayitānūpuraravavimiśrayeva haṃsagadgadayā girā kṛtasaṃbhāṣaṇo yathā manmathaḥ samājñāpayati, yathā yauvanamupadiśati,
GK19bahcar1u:450: yathā vidagdhatādhyāpayati, yathānurāgaḥ śikṣayati, tathā tāmabhirāmāṃ rāmāmaramayat /
GK19bahcar1u:455: tasmai ca jātamātrāyaiva “samyaksarahasyāḥ sarvevedāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi sakalāśca kalā matprabhāvātṝ svayamāvirbhaviṣyanti' iti varamadātṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:456: sadbhartṛślāghayā darśayitumiva hṛdayenādāya dadhīcaṃ pitāmahādeśātsamaṃ sāvitryā punarapi brahnalokamāruroha /
GK19bahcar1u:457: gatāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ dadhīco 'pi hṛdaye hrādinyevābhihato bhārgavavaṃśasaṃbhūtasya bhrāturbrāhnaṇasya
GK19bahcar1u:459: yasminnevāvasare sarasvatyasūta tanayaṃ tasminnevākṣamālāpi sutaṃ prasūtavatī /
GK19bahcar1u:460: tau tu sā nirviśeṣaṃ sāmānyastanyādinā śanaiḥ śanaiḥ śiśū samavardhayat /
GK19bahcar1u:463: atha sārasvato māturmahimnā yauvanārambha evāvirbhūtāśeṣavidyāsaṃbhārastasminsavayasi bhrātari preyasi prāṇasame suhṛdi vatse vāṅmayaṃ samastameva saṃcārayāmāsa /
GK19bahcar1u:464: cakāra ca kṛtadāraparigrahasyāsya tasmiṃnneva pradeśe prītyā prītikūṭanāmānaṃ nivāsam /
GK19bahcar1u:465: ātmanāpyāṣāḍhī, kṛṣṇājinī, akṣavalayī, valkalī, mekhalī, jaṭī ca bhūtvā
GK19bahcar1u:469: vipakṣakṣobhakṣamaḥ, kṣititalalabdhāyatiḥ, askhalitapravṛtto bhāgīrathīpravāha iva pāvanaḥ prāvartata vimalo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:481: anistriṃśā vidyādharāḥ, ajaḍāḥ kalāvantaḥ, adoṣāstārakāḥ, aparopatāpino
GK19bahcar1u:482: bhāsvantaḥ, anuṣmāṇo hutabhujaḥ, akusṛtayo bhoginaḥ, astambhāḥ puṇyālayāḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:483: aluptakrutukriyā dakṣāḥ, avyālāḥ kāmajitaḥ, asādhāraṇā dvijātayaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:484: teṣu caivamutpadyanamāneṣu, saṃsarati ca saṃsāre, yātsu yugeṣu, avatīrṇe
GK19bahcar1u:485: kalau, vahatsu vatsareṣu, vrajatsu vāsareṣu, atikrāmati ca kāle
GK19bahcar1u:486: prasavaparamparābhiranavaratamāpatati vikāśini vātsyāyanakule, krameṇa kuberanāmā vainateya iva gurupakṣapāti dvijo janma lebhe /
GK19bahcar1u:487: tasyābhavannacyutar iśāno haraḥ pāśupataśceti catvāro yugārambhā iva brāhnatejojanyamānaprajāvistārā nārāyaṇabāhudaṇjā iva saccakranandakāstanayāḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:488: tatra pāśupatasyaika evābhavad bhūbhāra ivācalakulasthitiḥ sthiraścaturudadhigambhīror'thapatiriti nāmnā samagrāgrajanmacakracūḍāmaṇirmahātmā sūnuḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:489_0: so 'janayad bhṛguṃ haṃsaṃ śuciṃ kaviṃ mahīdataṃ dharmaṃ jātavedasaṃ citrabhānuṃ tryakṣaṃ mahidattaṃ viśvarūpaṃ cetyekādaśa
GK19bahcar1u:490: alabhata ca citrabhānusteṣāṃ madhye rājadevyabhidhānāyāṃ brāhnaṇyāṃ bāṇamātmajam /
GK19bahcar1u:491: sa bāla eva balavato vidhervaśādupasaṃpannayā vyayujyata jananyā /
GK19bahcar1u:494: kṛtopanayanādikriyākalāpasya samāvṛttasya cāsya caturdaśavarṣadeśīyasya pitāpi śrutismṛtivihitaṃ kṛtvā dvijajanocitaṃ nikhilaṃ puṇyajātaṃ kālenādaśamīstha evāstamagamat /
GK19bahcar1u:495: saṃsthite ca pitari mahatā śokenābhīlamanuprāpto divāniśaṃ dahnamānahṛdayaḥ kathaṅkathamapi katipayāndivasānātmagṛha evānaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar1u:496: gate ca viralatāṃ śoke śanaiḥ śanairavinayanidānatayā svātantrayasya,
GK19bahcar1u:497: kutūhalabahulatayā ca bālabhāvasya, dhairyapratipakṣatayā ca yauvanārambhasya, śaiśavocitānyanekāni cāpalānyācarannitvaro babhūva /
GK19bahcar1u:500: bhrātarau pāraśavau candrasenamātṛṣeṇau, bhāṣākadirīśānaḥ paraṃ mittram,
GK19bahcar1u:507: gāndharvopādhyāyo dardurakaḥ, saṃvāhikā, keralikā lāsakayuvā tāṇḍavikaḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:508: ākṣika ākhaṇjalaḥ, kitavo bhīmakaḥ, śailāliyuvā śikhaṇḍakaḥ, nartakī
GK19bahcar1u:509: hariṇikā, pārāśarī sumatiḥ, kṣapaṇako vīradevaḥ, kathakojayasenaḥ, śaivo
GK19bahcar1u:513_0: sa ebhiranyaiścānugamyamāno bālatayā nighnatāmupagato deśāntarāvalokanakautukākṣiptahṛdayaḥ satsvapipitṛpitāmahopātteṣu brāhnaṇajanociteṣu
GK19bahcar1u:513_1: vibhaveṣu sati cāvicchinne vidyāprasaṅge gṛhānniragāt agācca niravagraho grahavāniva navayauvanena svairiṇā manasā mahatāmupahāsyatām /
GK19bahcar1u:518: svabhāvagambhīradhīrdhanāni vidagdhamaṇḍalāni ca gāhamānaḥ, punarapi taimeva vaipaścitīmātmavaṃśocitāṃ prakṛtimabhajatṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:519: mahataśca kālāttameva bhūyo vātsyāyanavaṃśāśramamātmano janmabhuvaṃ brāhnaṇādhivāsamagamatṝ
GK19bahcar1u:520: tatra ca ciradarśanādabhinavībhūtasnehasadbhāvaiḥ sasaṃstavaprakaṭitajñāteyairāptairutsavadivasa ivānanditāgamano bālamitramaṇḍalamadhyagato mokṣasukhamivānvabhavatṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:521: iti śrīmahākavibāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite vātsyāyanavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma prathama ucchvāsaḥ
